author: Alejandro Escamilla
text: Bacon ipsum dolor amet shank capicola tenderloin jowl doner short loin ham, turducken pork bresaola cupim burgdoggen alcatra prosciutto.  Tenderloin pork chop drumstick leberkas sausage.  Ball tip pork belly pig short ribs bresaola ham hock flank sausage chislic bacon spare ribs turkey shoulder pork loin.  Chuck jowl pork loin prosciutto salami spare ribs bresaola, pork tenderloin turkey biltong rump cow brisket.  Pork chop ribeye tri-tip sausage t-bone turducken porchetta boudin ball tip sirloin chislic ham.  Chicken pastrami beef buffalo salami.
